name: 2 Guys Struggling
description:
Michel and Bernard want to go camping! But I think they choose the wrong day for it... Help them trough road and mud and rain to go at their camping!

Mouse clicks only, right to drive the car, left to push the car.

Game Design and Programmation by https://forest-ier.itch.io/

Visuals and Sounds by https://valou-tout-seul.itch.io/

Game made in 2h59 for the Trijam
